item.title: Microsoft: Xbox Scorpio Offers Nothing For Standard Gamers, Don't Buy It If you Don't Own a 4K Display
item.description:
Microsoft: Xbox Scorpio Offers Nothing For Standard Gamers, Don't Buy It If you Don't Own a 4K Display

We know that the Xbox Scorpio exists, we know that it's much more powerful than the Xbox One, but we don't know a whole lot else. Microsoft's decision to announce this far in advance was a bit surprising to some, but it's always nice to see cracks in that wall of silence that too often defines the video game industry.

item.title: VRSE rebrands to 'Within' in attempt to become the HBO of VR Content
item.description:
VRSE rebrands to 'Within' in attempt to become the HBO of VR Content

Vrse, the company that collaborated with several media outlets, including the New York Times and Vice, to bring virtual-reality stories, is rebranding to Within. If you didn't know, Vrse was supposed to be pronounced as "verse," according to Chief Operating Officer Drew Larner, who was previously the CEO of Rdio.

item.title: Coding Can Be Easy, But No One Wants To - Apple's 'Swift Playgrounds' Aims to Make You Want to Code
item.description:
Coding Can Be Easy, But No One Wants To - Apple's 'Swift Playgrounds' Aims to Make You Want to Code

There were tears during Apple's developer conference this year. Not so much that members of the audience risked dehydration, but people were definitely wiping the corners of their eyes. You don't see crying at tech events much, thank goodness, but I was happy to see it here.

item.title: Sony: Every Demo of PlayStation VR has been conducted on an everyday PS4..
item.description:
Sony: Every Demo of PlayStation VR has been conducted on an everyday PS4..

When PlayStation VR launches on October 13 in North America and Europe for $399, Sony is expecting there to be supply constraints. After the excitement and buzz from their presser at E3, sony felt it important to clarify that EVERY demo of PlayStation VR has been conducted on an everyday PS4.

item.title: Sony: All Games E3 PS4 Games Ran on a Standard PS4, God of War Played Live
item.description:
Sony: All Games E3 PS4 Games Ran on a Standard PS4, God of War Played Live

As for the lengthy God of War demo played during Sony's press conference, Technical Director Mihir Sheth confirmed that it was played live. "The demo that you saw was running on a regular PS4 ... and it was a live demo played at the press conference, contrary to what people are saying," he told the Daily Star.

item.title: Oculus Tries To Secure Exclusive Rights to VR titles, And Users Call BS
item.description:
Oculus Tries To Secure Exclusive Rights to VR titles, And Users Call BS

Oculus' policies and practices have been under fire almost since the Rift launch. The company's decision to launch into retail stores without first filling preorders sat poorly with many of its most ardent fans, while its decision to break the Revive compatibility project by introducing DRM to the Oculus Store flew directly in the face of earlier comments by founder Palmer Luckey.

item.title: Sony: PlayStation Neo is an Iterative Option, Not the Start of the Next Generation
item.description:
Sony: PlayStation Neo is an Iterative Option, Not the Start of the Next Generation

When Sony first put up the PlayStation VR Launch Bundle - complete with PlayStation Camera and Move motion controllers - on stores for pre-order, it sold out within minutes of being available.

item.title: ACER CHROMEBOOK 14: Gorgeous, Capable Laptop for Only $300
item.description:
ACER CHROMEBOOK 14: Gorgeous, Capable Laptop for Only $300

Not many Chromebooks can be called beautiful. Affordable? Sure. Portable? Often. But Chromebooks are almost exclusively budget systems, and design often falls by the wayside. Google tried to change preceptions with its Chromebook Pixel, but nobody wanted to pay $1,300 for a Chromebook, however nice it may be.

item.title: Nintendo NX Launch Won't Be Accompanied By A New Super Mario Game
item.description:
Nintendo NX Launch Won't Be Accompanied By A New Super Mario Game

Nintendo's next home video game console, codenamed "NX," won't launch with a new Super Mario title when it debuts worldwide in March 2017. Super Mario Bros., Super Mario Galaxy, and Super Mario Sunshine are games that belong to the main Super Mario series.

item.title: From Dominance to Last Place: Nintendo Continues to Assert That Content Trumps Visuals and Hardware
item.description:
From Dominance to Last Place: Nintendo Continues to Assert That Content Trumps Visuals and Hardware

Although this year's E3 presentations had a fair number of exciting games on show, there was also a large focus on the hardware side of things. As one notable example, Microsoft was happy to discuss new models of the Xbox One, with particular interest in the six teraflop Project Scorpio.
